summary: In this segment, the self-driving vehicle is traveling on a wet highway. Multiple trucks are visible ahead, with one truck on the left side and another on the right side. The truck on the left side begins to merge into the self-driving vehicles lane, causing a potential cut-in situation. The self-driving vehicle maintains a consistent speed and lane position throughout the segment.
actions: The self-driving vehicle maintains a consistent speed and lane position to avoid collision with the merging truck on the left side. The vehicles speed remains steady to ensure safe driving conditions on the wet road.
key_objects: 1) Left side: A blue truck, approximately 10 meters away, merging into the self-driving vehicles lane, causing a potential cut-in situation. 2) Right side: A blue truck, approximately 15 meters away, maintaining its lane position.
